author: gtrasuk
msg: Accidentally-create "App.java" and "AppTest.java" (defaults in a new Netbeans project) are now gone.

author: chetanm
msg: OAK-2177 - Configurable Analyzer in Lucene index
Add a try/catch while loading the factories and also switch the TCCL before calling as static initialization code in the various factories do initial loading using the TCCL

author: schor
msg: [UIMA-4146][UIMA-4145][UIMA-4135][UIMA-4126] support snapshot iterators, support for modifying indexed FSs, fix delta cas deserialization to not corrupt indices, fix cut/paste error in deser array values for byte, float, and string, if target and source type systems had different offsets for feature
